Package ai.learning.q

Class QArrayStore

java.lang.Object
ai.learning.q.QArrayStore
public class QArrayStore
extends java.lang.Object
The Class QArrayStore. This holds the 2D array that stores states and their actions with associated actions

  • Method Details

    • updateValue

      public boolean updateValue​(State state, Action action, float value)
      Update value. This method will update the value for the action for the state. If the state does not exist, create a new state. If the action does not exist create a new action with value
      Parameters:
      state - the state
      action - the action
      value - the value
      Returns:
      true, if successful
